channel.title: Online Training on Ideas on Stage
channel.description: Recent content in Online Training on Ideas on Stage

item.title: Ideas on Stage Webinars
item.description: Virtual Meeting Revolution - Free Webinar Series We’re all facing a complex, unprecedented situation, and those of us who aren’t used to working remotely may feel disconnected, isolated, or lost. Wouldn’t it be great if every team could use virtual meetings to keep a sense of community and connection? Stop and think about that for a moment. Meetings? Most physical meetings are a waste of time and energy, and now that many of us are working from home, we’re finding that too many virtual meetings have the same problem.

item.title: Virtual Meeting Revolution
item.description: We all spend much of our working time in meetings, and we know how inefficient they usually are. Now most of those meetings are online, and they’re no better: in fact, they are even more tiring. Our Virtual Meeting Revolution training offers a completely new approach to make everybody more productive, and turn each virtual meeting into a real success. A 5-step method for imagining and leading a successful online meeting 1.
